message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $1400000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1350000 for the product.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1420000. I believe this price is a fair compromise between our initial offers.
I understand Alice, but based on my assessment, I am willing to offer $1375000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit higher than your last offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1390000. This is my final offer for now.
Considering our previous negotiations, I believe a fair price for the product would be $1380000.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1390000, but I think I can do better than that. I'm going to make a strong push for $1395000. This is my last offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
Given the current situation, I believe a reasonable price for the product would be $1385000.
I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, Bob. I'm going to stick with $1395000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
